sentences.sContent: Position the cursor before the letter you want to delete.
sentences.sCn: 把光标放在你想删去的字母之前。

sentences.sContent: ...Macy’s hopes Bluemercury will help strengthen its position in the category...
...What position does the woman hold in the company...
...The Arctic sea ice holds a central position in the Earth's climate system and it's deteriorating faster than expected...
...When you get the consumer into a position of worry and inconvenience...
...That is the position in which Janet Yellen...
...What sealed Nokia's fate was a series of decisions made by Stephen Elop in his position as CEO...
...they're in a much better position to rebuild their lives...
...Do you take an opening position in a negotiation which differs from the eventual goal you are heading for...
...Evidence suggests the UK's position is much stronger than in the recent past and is still showing improvement...
...But the position won’t start until early next month...
...He’d been hoping for the position for a long time...

phrases.pCn: 就位；在适当的位置；在原位
起始领先位置；跑道内圈
关键部位，要害部位；位置关键帧
高位，指重要位置；领导地位（身份）
目前位置，当前位置；流动财务状况
特殊位置；特殊版面；特殊版位

words.tran: 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事
造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论
[计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置

trans.tranOther: to carefully put something in a particular position
the place where someone or something is, especially in relation to other objects and places
